description: Phone Favorites is the fastest quick dial app and the only one that looks and feels like it came with your phone!  List your favorite contacts for speedy access in the future. Launch the app and tap a contact to instantly dial the number -- tap the SMS button to send a text message.  Access the native dial pad, where you can create, search, and call other contacts, without leaving the application.  Use it for a few days and you will give up the Phone app’s spot to your Favorites!  We pay meticulous attention to detail in our products and specialize in usable software. If you find as much as pocket lint in our apps, we want to hear about it!  **Updated: Lightning fast startup time. Optional SMS button for sending a text message.**
